location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Edwin Dawes, HM Gunboat Clyde,Bombay Harbour to Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing Dawes' best attempt at a portrait of Ameer Fysul [Emir Faisul] (drawn during Pelly's recent visit to Riyadh). The portrait is no longer enclosed with the letter.The letter also discusses Dawes new appointment on the gunboat Clyde; the location and duties of the Bereniceand an outbreak of cholera in Kurachee [Karachi].
